Question.Subject: does any one know any good free music sites?
Question.Content: does any one know any good free music sites? and not like lime wire i mean like mp3raid.com i just need sites like that i donot care if they are legal or not
Question.ChosenAnswer: Tigow.com is amazing. You can listen to the songs before you download it :)

Answer.Content: Tigow.com is amazing. You can listen to the songs before you download it :)

You don't care if they're legal or not? Do the people you're putting out of work care? Does your mother know you're a thief???
Are you aware that the RIAA actually looks for thieves, and sometimes takes them to court and it could cost YOU between $250 and $1,500 PER SONG if it's you they come after?
http://chillingeffects.org/weather.cgi?WeatherID=630
Stolen music costs the music industry $12.5 BILLION dollars a year: http://www.riaa.com/faq.php
Stolen software costs the software industry $53 BILLION a year: http://www.bsa.org/country/News%20and%20Events/News%20Archives/en/2010/en-02182010-iptheft.aspx
Are these the values you will be teaching your children?
You SHOULD care!
www.beemp3.com Possibly the best website for music EVER!!! I have downloaded loads and loads of tracks from there. Give it a spin
Answer.Reference: Google and a healthy glob of luck
